com.foreach.across.core.support

Interface WritableAttributes

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.core.AttributeAccessor, ReadableAttributes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeOverridingSupport, AttributeSupport

    public interface WritableAttributes
extends ReadableAttributes, org.springframework.core.AttributeAccessor
    Interface defining a generic contract for attaching and accessing metadata to/from arbitrary objects. Writable implementation of ReadableAttributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <Y> Y removeAttribute(Class<Y> attributeType)
      Remove the attribute identified by attributeType and return its value.
      <Y> void setAttribute(Class<Y> attributeType, Y attributeValue)
      Set the attribute defined by attributeType to the supplied value.
      void setAttributes(Map<String,Object> attributes)
      Copy all attributes from the source map into the current set.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.foreach.across.core.support.ReadableAttributes

        attributeMap, attributeNames, getAttribute, getAttribute, getAttribute, hasAttribute, hasAttribute

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.core.AttributeAccessor

        attributeNames, computeAttribute, getAttribute, hasAttribute, removeAttribute, setAttribute

    • Method Detail

      • setAttribute

        <Y> void setAttribute(Class<Y> attributeType,
                      Y attributeValue)
        Set the attribute defined by attributeType to the supplied value. If value is null, the attribute is removed.
        Parameters:
        attributeType - the unique attribute key
        attributeValue - the attribute value to be attached

      • setAttributes

        void setAttributes(Map<String,Object> attributes)
        Copy all attributes from the source map into the current set.
        Parameters:
        attributes - to set

      • removeAttribute

        <Y> Y removeAttribute(Class<Y> attributeType)
        Remove the attribute identified by attributeType and return its value. Return null if no attribute under attributeType is found.
        Parameters:
        attributeType - the unique attribute key
        Returns:
        the last value of the attribute, if any
